'''Athel Wood Compact Desk''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Athel Wood Compact Desk is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after solving a {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] puzzle in the [[Temir Mountains]].
